tool_description: Simple API for global cinema, showtimes, movies and VOD metadata.
title: International Showtimes

api_list.name: Get all cinemas in a specific country
api_list.description: List of all cinemas in a particular country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://international-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com/api.internationalshowtimes.com/v4/cinemas/?countries=DE"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all showtimes per movie in a specific City
api_list.description: Get all showtimes per movie in a specific City
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://international-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com/api.internationalshowtimes.com/v4/showtimes?city_ids=1&movie_id=12345"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all movies playing in a particular cinema
api_list.description: get all movies playing in a particular cinema
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://international-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com/api.internationalshowtimes.com/v4/movies/?cinema_id="

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
